_header: Ne may no lewed lede liven in land
Subjects: satire; courts, consistory; law, attack on administration of

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Ne mai no lewed lued libben in londeBe he neuer in hyrt so hauer of
                    honde…
BLHar2253.Last Lines: …Wyde heo worcheþ vs woFor wymmene ware
